description:
### 11.181 ocv

Apply a video transform using libopencv.

To enable this filter, install the libopencv library and headers and configure
FFmpeg with `--enable-libopencv`.

It accepts the following parameters:

**filter_name**

    The name of the libopencv filter to apply. 

**filter_params**

    The parameters to pass to the libopencv filter. If not specified, the default values are assumed. 

Refer to the official libopencv documentation for more precise information:
<http://docs.opencv.org/master/modules/imgproc/doc/filtering.html>

Several libopencv filters are supported; see the following subsections.
name: ocv

options.description: The name of the libopencv filter to apply.
options.name: filter_name

options.description: The parameters to pass to the libopencv filter. If not specified, the default values are assumed.
options.name: filter_params
